messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the hunters aren’t seen or heard?
Their presence will become known when the investigators hear gunshots ahead.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the investigators if they are wearing brightly colored clothing?
There are no gunshots, as they are not mistaken for potential game.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if hunters spot the investigators before shots are taken?
Contact can be made by waving or crying a 'hello'.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of a failed group Luck roll?
A random investigator has been mistaken for a wild animal and shot at by the hunters for 1D3 damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the investigators if they are wearing brightly colored clothing?
There are no gunshots, as they are not mistaken for potential game.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when a group Luck roll fails?
A random investigator has been mistaken for a wild animal and shot at by the hunters for 1D3 damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of damage is inflicted by the hunters?
The damage manifests as a flesh wound.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are the members of the hunting party?
Alistair Lawson, George Lawson, Brian Hall, and Arthur Hall.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How old are George and Arthur?
George is 14 years old and Arthur is 12 years old.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are the members of the hunting party?
Alistair Lawson, George Lawson, Brian Hall, and Arthur Hall.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why did the Lawsons pull back from the forest?
George was getting scared at night.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When were Brian and Arthur Hall last seen?
They haven't been seen since a couple of days back.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was George afraid of at night?
George was getting scared at night.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What were George and his dad having in their bad dreams?
They were having bad dreams, but they don't remember what they were about.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was Alistair dreaming about?
He was dreaming that he was drowning.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the direction given to the investigators from the briefing?
Northeast
